LanguageData.Archer25.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fought for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] and specialized in the use of bows, pila, and other ranged weapons.
LanguageData.Archer25.title: 궁수
LanguageData.Banished68.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe banished [PAWN_objective] following a bloody dispute. [PAWN_pronoun] survived in the wilds alone for a long time.
LanguageData.Banished68.title: 추방자
LanguageData.Brave88.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef}(은)는 도끼, 둔기 등 근거리 무기를 이용해 {PAWN_possessive} 부족을 위해 싸웠습니다.
LanguageData.Brave88.title: 용사
LanguageData.Butcher40.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s main job in the hunting party was the butchering of animals. [PAWN_pronoun] became a master with the knife, able to extract every bit of value from a carcass in a short time.
LanguageData.Butcher40.title: 도축
LanguageData.Carver1.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] carved artworks for [PAWN_possessive] tribe from wood, stone, and occasionally, more exotic materials. The work was sometimes sold, and sometimes kept to beautify settlements and provide a focus for rituals.
LanguageData.Carver1.title: 조각가
LanguageData.CaveBuilder81.title: 동굴 건설자
LanguageData.Digger31.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] labored in mines and caves, digging out spaces for storing items and hiding from threats. [PAWN_possessive] work provided hiding spots for [PAWN_possessive] friends on many occasions.
LanguageData.Digger31.title: 땅굴꾼
LanguageData.Digger66.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] carved living spaces and mined minerals from the sides of hills and mountains. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to feel at home picking through rock and shoring up cave walls.
LanguageData.Digger66.title: 땅굴꾼
LanguageData.Excavator55.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at dig sites, extracting valuable items and materials from ancient compacted ruins. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to spot valuables in the ground and use a variety of excavating tools.
LanguageData.Excavator55.title: 굴착꾼
LanguageData.Framer37.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for erecting structures for [PAWN_possessive] fellow tribespeople to live in. This included both temporary structures for nomadic travel, and permanent settlements. Gathering building materials from local plant life was part of the job.
LanguageData.Framer37.title: 골조 건축가
LanguageData.Gatherer70.baseDesc: Using [PAWN_possessive] knowledge of plants, roots, and berries, [PAWN_nameDef] could find food in even the most barren landscapes. [PAWN_pronoun] stayed away from animals.
LanguageData.Gatherer70.title: 채집가
LanguageData.Healer46.baseDesc: After [PAWN_possessive] tribe's elder healer was killed in a raid, [PAWN_nameDef] took on the role. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days scrounging up herbs and mineral compounds from the nearby area to use in surprisingly effective remedies.
LanguageData.Healer46.title: 치유사
LanguageData.HearthTender66.baseDesc: 다른 사람들이 채집하며 사냥을 하러 나가 있는 동안, {PAWN_nameDef}(은)는 집에서 요리하며 아픈 사람들을 돌볼 수 있었습니다.
LanguageData.HearthTender66.title: 가정 지킴이
LanguageData.Herder33.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] herded a variety of animals to help feed and clothe [PAWN_possessive] tribe while on the move. [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to calm and direct the beasts, and how to hunt [PAWN_possessive] own meals on the trail.
LanguageData.Herder33.title: 양치기
LanguageData.Hunter74.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tracked, trapped and killed animals for their meat and leather.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] used both ranged and melee weapons. Sometimes, [PAWN_pronoun] hunted alongside animals.
LanguageData.Hunter74.title: 사냥꾼
LanguageData.Logger16.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] chopped trees and hauled their lumber back to the tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] wielded [PAWN_possessive] axe with the finesse of an artist and the force of a charging muffalo.
LanguageData.Logger16.title: 벌목꾼
LanguageData.Loner61.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never much liked the tribal council or the yearly festivals. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred the open plain and the whistle of wind through the rocks.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] visited [PAWN_possessive] tribe from time to time, but mostly took care of [PAWN_objective]self using [PAWN_possessive] own survival skills.
LanguageData.Loner61.title: 방황자
LanguageData.LoreKeeper51.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of a long line of lore keepers in [PAWN_possessive] tribe. Every night around the fire, [PAWN_pronoun] would pass on ancient knowledge and helpful wisdom through stories.
LanguageData.LoreKeeper51.title: 전승자
LanguageData.Malingerer28.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] often feigned sickness in order to avoid [PAWN_possessive] responsibilities. While resting in the sick hut, [PAWN_pronoun] told stories to the children.
LanguageData.Malingerer28.title: 꾀병쟁이
LanguageData.MuffaloShaman95.baseDesc: Because of [PAWN_possessive] quiet wisdom and great strength, [PAWN_nameDef] became the spiritual guide for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] had a special connection with the great spirit of the muffalo.
LanguageData.MuffaloShaman95.title: 머팔로 주술사
LanguageData.PlankCutter72.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped [PAWN_possessive] tribe build huge wooden structures by cutting trees into sturdy planks. [PAWN_nameDef] developed a fine understanding of how wood grows and splits.
LanguageData.PlankCutter72.title: 판자꾼
LanguageData.Scout59.baseDesc: Since [PAWN_possessive] tribe made contact with local outlanders, [PAWN_nameDef] contracted [PAWN_possessive] services out as a guide. Frequent contact with ancient technology made [PAWN_objective] comfortable with the lost machines.
LanguageData.Scout59.title: 스카우트
LanguageData.StewKeeper95.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] prepared meals from the plants and animals brought in by gatherers, farmers, and hunters of [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] had to make sure it was calorie-efficient, long-lasting, and healthy. [PAWN_pronoun] often processed and sometime gathered plants [PAWN_objective]self.
LanguageData.StewKeeper95.title: 스프 책임자
LanguageData.Tamer79.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s role in [PAWN_possessive] tribe was to connect with the natural world around - especially the world of animals. In addition to fulfilling a spiritual role, [PAWN_pronoun] also tamed wild beasts and cared for them as they served the tribe.
LanguageData.Tamer79.title: 조련사
LanguageData.TreehouseBuilder86.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] built houses among, and sometimes suspended in, the trees for [PAWN_possessive] people to use while traveling or foraging. [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to best find and use wild plants, and how to fight off wild animals.
LanguageData.TreehouseBuilder86.title: 숲의 목수
LanguageData.VengefulHunter32.baseDesc: Following the death of a close friend by animal attack, [PAWN_nameDef] hunted the beast responsible. [PAWN_pronoun] tracked it to a nearby village, only to find one of the villagers wearing its pelt.
LanguageData.VengefulHunter32.title: 복수의 사냥꾼
LanguageData.Warrior94.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fearsome warrior, proficient with many weapons. [PAWN_pronoun] participated in many battles.
LanguageData.Warrior94.title: 전사
LanguageData.Weaver63.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expert at working wool, plant fibers and natural dyes into beautiful clothing for [PAWN_possessive] kin. [PAWN_possessive] handicrafts were traded frequently with other settlements.
LanguageData.Weaver63.title: 방직공
